attributes.action: Stop BBC TV editors from using unnecessary background music in documentaries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Research shows that a significant minority of hearing impaired people (mainly elderly) find it difficult/impossible to understand speech against background noise and are thus denied the full use of TV available to those fortunate enough to have better hearing. Stress Documentaries not Dramas.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
